(?:^|/)(?i)LICEN[CS]E
(?:^|/)package(?:-lock)\.json$
(?:^|/)vendor/
ignore$
\.lock$
\.min\.
\.mod$
^images/gitgitgadget\.png$
^script/lookup-commit\.sh$
^\.github/
^\.vscode/settings\.json$
